page.title: 04FREE DAILY NEWSPAPER
page.content: Since October 2nd 1984,Birmingham households have begun to receive Britains first free daily newspaper. We thought it would be interesting to visit the offices of the Daily News. The Editor said the main stages of making the paper were planning,making sure they get enough advertising, getting the papers printed,and getting them to 300,000 homes. 100 people work full time on the paper and 3,200 part time. The editor said that no matter how popular the paper becomes they will never make the public pay for the paper.They receive the news by a London wire service,and letters from the community.The 30 reporters that work for the Daily News bring news from all areas. The Editor said the main job of the Daily News is to inform and entertain. By M.PEPPIN and P.MESSAM.
